content: Should char_poly (as in docs#char_poly) be called charpoly to agree with docs#minpoly? Maybe even matrix.charpoly: I don't find the characteristic polynomial of an endomorphism of a free module, but I think the name charpoly should be reserved to it. (I am going to define it, with a minimalistic API).
I'm pro renaming. It's an 'atomic' name part.
